segment.source: Create the periodic work item
segment.target: Create the periodic work item

segment.source: Use the CreatePeriodicTimer method to create a periodic work item.
segment.target: Use the CreatePeriodicTimer method to create a periodic work item.

segment.source: Supply a lambda that accomplishes the work, and use the period parameter to specify the interval between submissions.
segment.target: Supply a lambda that accomplishes the work, and use the period parameter to specify the interval between submissions.

segment.source: The period is specified using a TimeSpan structure.
segment.target: The period is specified using a TimeSpan structure.

segment.source: The work item will be resubmitted every time the period elapses, so make sure the period is long enough for work to complete.
segment.target: The work item will be resubmitted every time the period elapses, so make sure the period is long enough for work to complete.

segment.source: CreateTimer returns a ThreadPoolTimer object.
segment.target: CreateTimer returns a ThreadPoolTimer object.

segment.source: Store this object in case the timer needs to be canceled.
segment.target: Store this object in case the timer needs to be canceled.

segment.source: Note Avoid specifying a value of zero (or any value less than one millisecond) for the interval.
segment.target: Note Avoid specifying a value of zero (or any value less than one millisecond) for the interval.

segment.source: This causes the periodic timer to behave as a single-shot timer instead.
segment.target: This causes the periodic timer to behave as a single-shot timer instead.

segment.source: Note You can use CoreDispatcher.RunAsync to access the UI and show progress from the work item.
segment.target: Note You can use CoreDispatcher.RunAsync to access the UI and show progress from the work item.

segment.source: Handle cancellation of the periodic work item (optional)
segment.target: Handle cancellation of the periodic work item (optional)

segment.source: If needed, you can handle cancellation of the periodic timer with a TimerDestroyedHandler.
segment.target: If needed, you can handle cancellation of the periodic timer with a TimerDestroyedHandler.

segment.source: Use the CreatePeriodicTimer overload to supply an additional lambda that handles cancellation of the periodic work item.

segment.source: Cancel the timer
segment.target: Cancel the timer

segment.source: When necessary, call the Cancel method to stop the periodic work item from repeating.
segment.target: When necessary, call the Cancel method to stop the periodic work item from repeating.

segment.source: If the work item is running when the periodic timer is cancelled it is allowed to complete.
segment.target: If the work item is running when the periodic timer is cancelled it is allowed to complete.

segment.source: The TimerDestroyedHandler (if provided) is called when all instances of the periodic work item have completed.
segment.target: The TimerDestroyedHandler (if provided) is called when all instances of the periodic work item have completed.
